message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, $13,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  I'm willing to pay $11,500.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $11,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $12,500. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
